results.title: Trump Hits Back at Daughter’s Account That She Accepted His Election Loss
results.abstract: The former president, responding to videotaped testimony played at the Jan. 6 hearing, said Ivanka Trump had been “checked out” and was not involved in studying the election results.

media.caption: President Donald J. Trump and his elder daughter, Ivanka Trump, traveled to a political rally in Georgia two days before Trump supporters stormed the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021.

results.title: Starbucks’s C.E.O. Howard Schultz: ‘I don’t know if we can keep our bathrooms open.’
results.abstract: Speaking at The Times’s DealBook D.C. policy forum, Howard Schultz said safety concerns have prompted Starbucks to reconsider its 2018 policy on customer use of restrooms.

results.title: ‘Trump Was at the Center’: Jan. 6 Hearing Lays Out Case in Vivid Detail
results.abstract: The House panel investigating the attack led its public sessions with video testimony from people close to the former president about his actions before and during the riot.

results.title: Fitting Into His Schedule, Then Into Her Royal Family
results.abstract: Jamal Akil Robinson offered just 30 minutes for his first get-together with Edna Tafari Makonnen, an Ethiopian princess. When the meeting ran to an hour, he saw it as a good sign.

media.caption: Edna Tafari Makonnen and Jamal Akil Robinson were married April 30 at Saints Peter and Paul Antiochian Orthodox Christian Church in Potomac, Md.

results.title: The Jan. 6 Hearing Put a True-Crime Drama on Prime-Time TV

results.title: Paladino Draws Backlash for Calling Hitler ‘the Kind of Leader We Need’
results.abstract: Carl Paladino, a Republican House candidate from New York, has been endorsed by Representative Elise Stefanik, a member of party leadership.

media.caption: Carl Paladino, who was also the G.O.P. nominee for governor of New York in 2010, at Trump Tower. Mr. Paladino spoke positively about Hitler’s ability to inspire his followers and called on Republicans to emulate his approach.
